text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Due to the Dems impeachment failure of our great President, they snuck in all this BS going on today. President Trump was up on the virus since November 2019. He was side by side with the cdc. Pelosi and her make shift crew of babbling idiots were busy in illegal acts.... Covid19
